## AbstractResponseBuilder.say() method

Say something to the user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract say(ssml: string | ResponseOutput, append?: boolean): AbstractResponseBuilder<R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ssml | string \| [ResponseOutput](./stentor-models.responseoutput.md) | The response, either as a string or a response output object which contains SSML and display text. |
|  append | boolean | Append the response to the existing, if available |

[AbstractResponseBuilder](./stentor-models.abstractresponsebuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;R&gt;

The builder instance
